# mirror redhat images

mas mirror-redhat-images


get pull secret:
https://console.redhat.com/openshift/downloads#tool-pull-secret
 copy it in a file in the container:

echo '{"auths":{"cloud.openshift.com":{"auth":"b3BlbnNoaWZ0LXJlbGVhc2UtZGV2K29jbV9hY2Nlc3NfOGUxZmFmOWJjOWQ3NDYxZWI0YWRmOWI5NWU5NmFiZmQ6WFFZTFVYNVFDS040UFJDTFlNT0NGQjhOTzlSOFdCTVFLN09BMDFXTkRXWFY0RURSSDBGR1lSN0VONzRDOEc1MA==","email":"matthieulrx@nl.ibm.com"},"quay.io":{"auth":"b3BlbnNoaWZ0LXJlbGVhc2UtZGV2K29jbV9hY2Nlc3NfOGUxZmFmOWJjOWQ3NDYxZWI0YWRmOWI5NWU5NmFiZmQ6WFFZTFVYNVFDS040UFJDTFlNT0NGQjhOTzlSOFdCTVFLN09BMDFXTkRXWFY0RURSSDBGR1lSN0VONzRDOEc1MA==","email":"matthieulrx@nl.ibm.com"},"registry.connect.redhat.com":{"auth":"","email":"matthieulrx@nl.ibm.com"},"registry.redhat.io":{"auth":"","email":"matthieulrx@nl.ibm.com"}}}' > /images/pullsecret.txt
